description: Metadata based on a small subset of Dublin Core.

sourceId.description: To be filled at creation by the source system with its unique identifier.

modified.description: The date and time at which the object was last modified.

created.description: The date and time at which the object was created. SHOULD be set if known.

creator.description: Person or organisation who created the object

validFrom.description: The earliest date and time from which the object is valid.

validTo.description: The latest date and time to which the object is valid.

isDeleted.description: Boolean value indicating if this resource has been deleted in the source system.
